title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to   Use Volanta on a tablet to track your flight
description:
In this video I will show you how you can use the Volanta app on a tablet to track your flights of MSFS 2020. To use the Volanta app you will need to have an account which you can create for free.

Volanta website:
https://volanta.app
